summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC Brooklyn, transmitting discovery materials and Government Exhibits related to her criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The recipient of the letter, an inmate at MDC Brooklyn, referenced by her case number and as the subject of the enclosed discovery materials.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
MDC Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center, P.O. Box 329002, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sent discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell on October 29, 2021.
The correspondence is related to the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Ghislaine Maxwell was incarcerated at MDC Brooklyn under registration number 02879-509 at the time.
